resources.string: Each bubble represents an action. Its area is proportional to the amount of CO2 given off by performing it.
How do various CO2-emitting actions compare, in terms of how much CO2 is given off?

It\'s easy to forget how some actions give off a lot more CO2 than others... It\'s no good turning off the water every time you brush your teeth, if it clears your conscience enough to buy a plane ticket!
